Welcome to EduHack

We make teaching easy for you
Get Started Free Resources

We transform your teaching plan into something measurable and interactive

With our GPT integration and customized learning algorithm you will never have to prepare an interactive class again. It is as simple as uploading your teaching plan and we will do the rest, providing you with a fully labeled schedule for all your courses, and a list of interactive activities that you can use to make your classes more engaging.

How can I make it even more personalized?

Just go to the Dashboard section and connect your Google Calendar account. We will use your calendar to make a personalized schedule that accomodates your times!

Our algorithm is capable of doing more outside the classroom...

Personalized Teaching Plan

We will provide you with a personalized teaching plan that will help you organize your classes and make them more interactive.

Organized Dashboard

With our smart dashboard you can keep track of all your classes and assign interactive activities reccomended for each study plan.

Integrated Calendar

Capability to connect with Google Calendar to offer a more organized and personalized experience for your study plan creation.
